text: DYXX-TV, channel 6, is a commercial originating VHF television station of GMA Network. It is owned by Asian-Pacific Broadcasting Company under the operations of the same network. Its studios are located at the GMA Compound, Phase 5, Alta Tierra Village, MacArthur Drive, Barangay Quintin Salas, Jaro, Iloilo City and the transmitters are located at Pi√±a-Tamborong-Alaguisoc Road, Jordan, Guimaras with the power of 30,000 watts and with effective radiating power of 72,000 watts. It covers the entire Western Visayas (Region 6), Romblon and parts of Cebu. ==GMA TV-6 Iloilo currently airing programs== * One Western Visayas * The Word of God Network ==GMA TV-6 Iloilo previously aired programs== * Bongga! * Tok! Tok! Tok! Kwarta Pasok! * Saksi sa Western Visayas * Banat * Bantay * 300 Seconds * Kape at Balita * The Ilonggo Agenda (special programing for 2010 elections) * Ratsada * Araguy * Istayl Naton * Ilonggo Isyu Subong * Let's Fiesta * Visita Iglesia * Arangkada * 24 Oras Western Visayas * Ratsada 24 Oras ==Relay stations== Station Location Channels ERP DYBB-TV Kalibo, Aklan 2 (VHF) 5 kW (11 kW ERP) DYAM-TV Roxas, Capiz 5 (VHF) 5 kW (0.39 kW ERP) DYGM-TV Bacolod 13 (VHF) 20 kW DYAQ-TV Murcia, Negros Occidental 30 (UHF) 5 kW DYSL-TV Sipalay 10 (VHF) 1 kW == Related pages == * GMA Network == Other websites == * GMANetwork.com Category:Filipino television stations Category:1967 establishments in Asia Category:1960s establishments in the Philippines Category:Western Visayas
title: DYXX-TV
